pullRequest.title: [WIP] Added source table and partitions to CopierContext
pullRequest.bodyText: Adding Table sourceTable and List<Partition> sourcePartitions to CopierContext in order to propagate table and partition filter information down to the copiers.

commit.message: Added source table and partitions to CopierContext
